revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #23 Qualot |image = [[File:Qualot.png]] |caption = La plante de cette Baie n'a aucun mal à pousser en région pluvieuse ou en terrain humide. Elle est pleine de vitalité. |growtime = 1h 20m 0s |harvest = 22 baies |replant = 20% |mutation = 0,05% |points = 550 |flavor =
*10 épicée *0 sèche *10 sucrée *0 amère *10 acide }} '''Qualot''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant une parcelle vide avec au moins 10, mais pas plus de 15 points de saveur épicée, sucrée et acide et 0 points de toute autre saveur. Les baies [[Cheri/fr|Ceriz]], [[Pecha/fr|Pêcha]] et [[Aspear/fr|Willia]] doivent avoir été débloquées afin d'obtenir cette baie. == Tables de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Pousse !! Arbuste !! Fleuri !! Mûr |- ! Temps écoulé depuis plantation | 3 mins 50 secs || 16 mins 40 secs || 41 mins 40 secs || 1 heure 20 mins - 2 heures 40 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:QualotTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Temps de croissance avec modificateurs === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificateur !! Temps maturité-flétrissement !! Nombre de Fertipousse requis |- ! Aucun | 1 heure 20 mins -
2 heures 40 mins || --- |- ! Engrais ou Kwakarrosoir | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 heure 46 mins 40 secs || 11 engrais |- ! Engrais et Kwakarrosoir | 35 mins 33 secs -
1 heure 11 mins 6 secs || 8 engrais |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Qualot_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following ways to obtain Qualot berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pinap.png|30px]] [[Pinap]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] |-style="height: 50px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Cheri.png|30px]]
[[Cheri]] |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Aspear]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Cheri]] || 30 secs until ripe || 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | colspan=4|'''''OR''''' |- | [[Mago]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pinap]] || 4 mins until ripe || 2 mins 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Qualot berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Wacan.png|20px]] [[Wacan]] || [[File:Pinap.png|20px]] [[Pinap]]
[[File:Iapapa.png|20px]] [[Iapapa]]
[[File:Grepa.png|20px]] [[Grepa]] |- |}

*10 épicée *0 sèche *10 sucrée *0 amère *10 acide }} '''Qualot''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant une parcelle vide avec au moins 10, mais pas plus de 15 points de saveur épicée, sucrée et acide et 0 points de toute autre saveur. Les baies [[Cheri/fr|Ceriz]], [[Pecha/fr|Pêcha]] et [[Aspear/fr|Willia]] doivent avoir été débloquées afin d'obtenir cette baie. == Tables de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 hour 46 mins 40 secs || 11 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 35 mins 33 secs -
1 hour 11 mins 6 secs || 8 mulch |}
